          UCR Juneteenth Celebration 2021
         
 Celebrate with UCR by attending the  2nd annual Juneteenth Celebration 2021 , sponsored by BFASA, ASP, and BAC. The virtual event takes place  June 15-18.  Each day we will host an opportunity for the UC community and our families to learn more about the history, meaning, practice, and symbols of Juneteenth. Please see the attached press release, below flyer, and website link for more details. We look forward to fellowship with you. 
 
 Dial-In Information
